title.value: The maximum modules of the drain on meliorative system of 'Polessie Experimental Station of a Meliorative Agriculture and Grass Farming' during the different periods
Максимальные модули стока на мелиоративной системе РУП 'Полесская опытная станция мелиоративного земледелия и луговодства' в различные периоды

person.name: Avramenko, N.M., Polesje Experimental Station for Land Reclamation and Grassland Farming, Brest reg. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The results of a long-term research of the maximum sizes of modules of a drain on ameliorative system of Republican Unitary Enterprise 'Polesye Experimental Station for Land Reclamation and Grassland Farming' during the periods of winter, spring and autumn high waters are resulted. It is established that the observable greatest size of the maximum module of a drain of a spring high water makes 0,97 l/s per hectare at security of 5%. The maximum settlement modules of a drain of a spring high water of 25%-s and 10-s securities are equal to 0,65 and 0,83 l/s per hectare correspondingly. Observable greatest sizes of the maximum modules of a drain of autumn and winter high waters are accordingly equal 0,83 l/s per hectare at security of 1,9% and 0,8 l/s per hectare at security of 4%. The maximum settlement module of a drain of autumn high water of 10%-s securities makes 0,56 l/s per hectare. It is recommended to inspect the ameliorative network on the admission of the expense of autumn high water of 5-2%-s securities for the creation of the conditions of more operative tap of flood waters. To this security there will correspond settlement maximum modules of a drain equal 0,66-0,83 l/s per hectare.
